languages.text: Тайна заражения Простора Коронус скверной генокультов была раскрыта. По многим мирам прокатилась волна чисток — неистовствующая чернь и планетарная стража тысячами истребляли тех, чей облик отличался от образа Истинного Человека. Конечно, в основном это были обычные убогие генетические отщепенцы, невезучие выродки, но их жизни были малой платой за чистоту сектора.

The secret of the Genestealer Cult infestation in the Koronus Expanse was laid bare. A wave of purges rolled across many worlds, with enraged rabble and planetary guards massacring thousands of those whose appearance diverged from true human form. Most of them were, of course, ordinary abject genetic misfits and luckless rejects, but their lives were a small price for the sector's purity.
languages.original_text: Тайна заражения Простора Коронус скверной генокультов была раскрыта. По многим мирам прокатилась волна чисток — неистовствующая чернь и планетарная стража тысячами истребляли тех, чей облик отличался от образа Истинного Человека. A wave of purges rolled across many worlds, with enraged rabble and planetary guards massacring thousands of those whose appearance diverged from True Human form. Most of them were, of course, ordinary abject genetic misfits and luckless freaks, but their lives were a small price for the sector's purity.

languages.text: Das Geheimnis der Ausbreitung des Symbiontenkultes in der Koronus-Ausdehnung war gelüftet worden. Eine Welle von Säuberungen überrollte viele Welten, als ein wütender Mob und planetare Wachen Tausende von Menschen massakrierten, deren Aussehen von der Norm abwich. Die meisten von ihnen waren natürlich gewöhnliche genetische Missbildungen, aber ihre Leben waren nur ein geringer Preis für die Reinheit des Sektors.
languages.original_text: The secret of the Genestealer Cult infestation in the Koronus Expanse was laid bare. A wave of purges rolled across many worlds, with enraged rabble and planetary guards massacring thousands of those whose appearance diverged from true human form. Most of them were, of course, ordinary abject genetic misfits and luckless rejects, but their lives were a small price for the sector's purity.

traits.locale_text: Das Geheimnis der Ausbreitung des Symbiontenkultes in der Koronus-Ausdehnung war gelüftet worden. Eine Welle von Säuberungen überrollte viele Welten, als ein wütender Mob und planetare Wachen Tausende von Menschen massakrierten, deren Aussehen von der Norm abwich. Die meisten von ihnen waren natürlich gewöhnliche genetische Missbildungen, aber ihre Leben waren nur ein geringer Preis für die Reinheit des Sektors.

languages.text: L'infestation clandestine des Étendues de Koronus par le culte Genestealer éclata au grand jour. Une vaste campagne de purges s'ensuivit sur de nombreux mondes, alors que la populace enragée et les gardes planétaires massacraient des milliers de gens sur la seule foi de leur apparence, différente de celle des humains. Si la plupart des victimes n'étaient en réalité que de malheureuses créatures contrefaites et des parias aux mutations génétiques banales, leurs vies étaient un maigre prix à payer pour restaurer la pureté de la galaxie.
languages.original_text: The secret of the Genestealer Cult infestation in the Koronus Expanse was laid bare. A wave of purges rolled across many worlds, with enraged rabble and planetary guards massacring thousands of those whose appearance diverged from true human form. Most of them were, of course, ordinary abject genetic misfits and luckless rejects, but their lives were a small price for the sector's purity.

traits.locale_text: L'infestation clandestine des Étendues de Koronus par le culte Genestealer éclata au grand jour. Une vaste campagne de purges s'ensuivit sur de nombreux mondes, alors que la populace enragée et les gardes planétaires massacraient des milliers de gens sur la seule foi de leur apparence, différente de celle des humains. Si la plupart des victimes n'étaient en réalité que de malheureuses créatures contrefaites et des parias aux mutations génétiques banales, leurs vies étaient un maigre prix à payer pour restaurer la pureté de la galaxie.

languages.text: El secreto de la infestación de un Culto Genestealer en la Extensión de Koronus quedó al descubierto. Una oleada de purgas asoló numerosos mundos, en los que la turba enfurecida y los guardias planetarios masacraron a miles cuyas formas diferían del ser humano. Por supuesto, muchos eran simples inadaptados genéticos y despojos sin suerte, pero sus vidas eran un precio pequeño para purificar el sector.
languages.original_text: The secret of the Genestealer Cult infestation in the Koronus Expanse was laid bare. A wave of purges rolled across many worlds, with enraged rabble and planetary guards massacring thousands of those whose appearance diverged from true human form. Most of them were, of course, ordinary abject genetic misfits and luckless rejects, but their lives were a small price for the sector's purity.

traits.locale_text: El secreto de la infestación de un Culto Genestealer en la Extensión de Koronus quedó al descubierto. Una oleada de purgas asoló numerosos mundos, en los que la turba enfurecida y los guardias planetarios masacraron a miles cuyas formas diferían del ser humano. Por supuesto, muchos eran simples inadaptados genéticos y despojos sin suerte, pero sus vidas eran un precio pequeño para purificar el sector.

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスにはびこるジーンスティーラー・カルトの秘密が明らかになった。多くの惑星に粛清の波が押し寄せ、怒り狂った民衆や惑星の警備隊が、本来の人間としての姿からかけ離れた外見を持つ何千人者人々を虐殺した。当然ながら、彼らの多くは遺伝的不適合を持つ運の悪い不合格者であったが、その命は、このセクターの正常さを保つための些細な代償だった。
languages.original_text: The secret of the Genestealer Cult infestation in the Koronus Expanse was laid bare. A wave of purges rolled across many worlds, with enraged rabble and planetary guards massacring thousands of those whose appearance diverged from true human form. Most of them were, of course, ordinary abject genetic misfits and luckless rejects, but their lives were a small price for the sector's purity.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンスにはびこるジーンスティーラー・カルトの秘密が明らかになった。多くの惑星に粛清の波が押し寄せ、怒り狂った民衆や惑星の警備隊が、本来の人間としての姿からかけ離れた外見を持つ何千人者人々を虐殺した。当然ながら、彼らの多くは遺伝的不適合を持つ運の悪い不合格者であったが、その命は、このセクターの正常さを保つための些細な代償だった。

languages.text: 基因窃取者教团在科罗努斯扩区的肆虐被公之于众，清洗的浪潮席卷了无数世界，愤怒的暴民与行星守卫屠杀了亿万与正常人类外表不太一样的人。当然，绝大部分受害者都只不过是倒霉的怪胎，仅仅是基因出了点问题而已，但为了保障整个星区的纯洁，他们的死仅仅是个微不足道的代价。
languages.original_text: The secret of the Genestealer Cult infestation in the Koronus Expanse was laid bare. A wave of purges rolled across many worlds, with enraged rabble and planetary guards massacring thousands of those whose appearance diverged from true human form. Most of them were, of course, ordinary abject genetic misfits and luckless rejects, but their lives were a small price for the sector's purity.

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği'ndeki Gençalan Tarikatı istilasının sırları açığa çıktı. Pek çok dünyayı öfkeden köpüren ayaktakımı ve gezegen muhafızlarının görünümü hakiki insan suretinden farklı olan binlerce kişiyi katlettiği arındırma dalgaları vurdu. Bunlardan birçoğu, elbette ki genetik açıdan uyumsuz alelade sefiller ve dışlanmış bahtsız kişilerdi. Ancak canları, sektörün saflığı için ödenecek küçük bir bedelden ibaretti.
languages.original_text: The secret of the Genestealer Cult infestation in the Koronus Expanse was laid bare. A wave of purges rolled across many worlds, with enraged rabble and planetary guards massacring thousands of those whose appearance diverged from true human form. Most of them were, of course, ordinary abject genetic misfits and luckless rejects, but their lives were a small price for the sector's purity.
